html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-10492022-09-29,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Ukraine) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (UKRAINE) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add twelve (12) individuals and one (1) entity to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, who are subject to a broad dealings ban; and (2) add new prohibitions to the Regulations that prohibit any person in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada from conducting certain transactions and activities in the Russian-occupied regions of Kherson and Zaporizhzhia in Ukraine.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0202 Publication Date: 2022-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Ukraine) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (UKRAINE) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add twelve (12) individuals and one (1) entity to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, who are subject to a broad dealings ban; and (2) add new prohibitions to the Regulations that prohibit any person in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada from conducting certain transactions and activities in the Russian-occupied regions of Kherson and Zaporizhzhia in Ukraine.
